name: Merge Numbers - 2048
description:
Merge Numbers is SUPER addictive puzzle game with Minimalistic & Elegantly designed approach, which lets you think out of the box and sharpen your mind.

The Goal is to drag n merge the same numbered blocks. The challenge increases gradually with large numbered blocks. e.g. 1024 -> 2048 -> 4096 and so on

You get to enjoy this amazing new puzzle game while improving your memory, concentration levels and reflexes at the same time.


HOW TO PLAY
- Tap screen to hit blocks
- Merge blocks in a line with the same number
- Get higher number blocks as you merge two or more same numbered blocks


FEATURES
- Minimalistic & elegant design
- Smooth & simple controls
- Easy to learn and play
- Automatic save game
- Global Leader Boards
- Multiple themes like Jewel, Wood and Nature to enjoy in
- No time limits
- No wifi connection required
- Haptic feedback
- Privacy Settings to keep your game Data Protected and Safe
